About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I Studied Web Devlopment, Design and Multimedia Production at Waubonsee Community College in Sugar Grove, Illinois.

Yatco, LLC

Front End Developer

- Created custom websites for individual clients and travel destinations
- Worked from designs and ideas to create modern responsive and attractive web sites
- Wrote modular and reusable code using the .NET Framework
- Worked with a designer using PDFs and style guides to create pixel perfect web pages

Pleasant Street Machinery

Web Developer

- Used CMSMS to create a product catalog and inventory system
- Provided employee training on using CMSMS control panel
- Created a custom designed front end.

ChitownInTheMix

Web Developer

- Used CMSMS to create a voting system for a successful mult-week karaoke competition
- Created a custom designed front end.
